title: League of Legends Wedding Cake!
body: Check out this league-themed cake from a wedding I went to yesterday! :D

replies.body: :o I'm having a LoL-themed wedding, and this may be some awesome inspiration! Thanks for sharing, this is gorgeous!

Of course! I work in the wedding industry here in southern California and it was a first for me! They also had a bunch of other league-themed designs sprinkled throughout the day (a picture of Zyra on her bouquet) and I was freaking out!
OMG and its PURPLE? This cake is so much win! I want this in my tummy so so much. YUMMMMM.
...this would have been so tempting to take a huge slice of before the party.  With all the purple frosting and such... hope it wasn't just vanilla cake and frosting.
nope~ They were from top to bottom----> Carrot cake, Chocolate marble with banana cream (my favorite) and Lemon cake with raspberry jam in the bottom. SO YUMMY~~~
omg... all delicious types of cake I like.  Mmmmm...
AHHHHHH I WANT WARDS IN MY CAKE! Holy moley what if Birthday Candle Wards?!?!?! I want some! ._.
OMG!!! What a great Idea~ I'll try it sometime.......
Yakky was my videographer!  This is my wedding cake!  I can't believe it made it on these forums!! I LOVE MY CAKE!! =)
